text: Qui-Gon Jinn is a fictional character in the Star Wars saga. He is played by Liam Neeson in the 1999 movie Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace. Qui-Gon is an important character in the first episode of the prequel trilogy. He is a wise and powerful Jedi Master and the mentor of Obi-Wan Kenobi."Star Wars Episode I Production Notes: The Actors and Characters - Part I". StarWars.com. 1999-05-01. Archived from the original on 2004-10-23. https://web.archive.org/web/20041023023458/http://www.starwars.com/episode-i/bts/production/f19990501/indexp4.html. Retrieved 2009-04-05. Jinn is killed by Darth Maul who pierced his body with his lightsaber. ==References== ==Other websites== * at Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1999 Category:Star Wars characters
title: Qui-Gon Jinn
